description: This file sets up a knowledge base using Markdown files and a vector database, then initializes an agent to interact with the knowledge base and perform a query.

classes.name: MarkdownKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Class representing a knowledge base built from Markdown files.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Class representing a vector database using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating it.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, formatted in markdown.
